info.name: Sharpen Corners
info.description:
Many people and companies are rounding the corners of their websites and software, but many people prefer sharper corners. This userstyle sharpens all corners of elements in websites.

(Note: This may not work, but I am still working on it.)
info.additionalInfo: Note: This is in development. Release notes: v1.1.0.4 - Started working on excluding elements in case they interfere with other elements as a square instead of a circle. (Yes, I know that that was a terrible description.) v1.0.0.3 - Changed the logo to make the purpose of this userstyle more obvious. v1.0.0.2 - Proper capitalization in the title. v1.0.0.1 - First logo. Added corner sharpener using a wildcard (*).
